General.Name: Galore Resources Inc
General.Description: Galore Resources Inc., through its subsidiary, Minerales Galore, S.A de C.V., engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral properties in North America. The company is exploring for gold. Its flagship project is the Dos Santos gold and base-metal property located in northern Zacatecas State, Mexico. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is based in North Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1125 Howe Street, North Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6Z 2K8
